mapper.select: select MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_TYPE, MEMBER_NAME from MEMBER
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_TYPE, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_REGDATE) values (#{memberId}, #{memberType}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberGender}, #{memberAge}, sysdate)
